Description: If the lemmatization is known by the system.
If it contains new information (CF GW SENSE POS EPOS NORM0).
Based on the Concise Dictionary of Akkadian (CDA). No imitation. CDA parentheses are ignored.
First translation in CDA. Use [unit] for weights/measures.
Local meaning. Added with // after the GW.
Effective Part of Speech. Used when the function differs from the original POS.
Normalization. Do not use secondary length. Normalize what is written.
Adjective (including statives and participles if they modify a noun)
Noun (including statives used as a noun)
Number (only if it starts syllabically or has a complement)
Phrasal Semantic Units (idioms). Require their own entry.
Proper Names. Initial capital letter. No long vowels.
